projects.title: Skin Disease Classification
projects.bodyText:
- A Web App that allows users to check if they are suffering from **skin disease** (skin cancer) or not.
 - User has to just click the photo of the skin and upload it on our platform, our model will **predict** which skin disease he/she is sufferening from.
 - Our Model will give user **three predections** with score out of 100%.

projects.title: Lawfax AI -  Crafting the future of law with AI
projects.bodyText:
- A legal services platform designed to assist advocates in case management, document automation, and proxy counsel features.
 - Added User authentication and password reset using **Jwt Token**.
 - **Chat App** Feature for advocates so that they can chat with other advocates.
 - Each Advocate has its own **wallet**.
 - Deployed on **AWS**.

projects.title: NitageDL - Building Tomorrow's Solutions Today
projects.bodyText:
- **NitageDL**'s company website serves as a vital platform for capturing leads on new projects.
 - **ContactUs** form-When users fill out and submit the form, their information is directly **emailed** to the company, enabling NitageDL to efficiently gather new project inquiries and engage potential **clients** promptly.
 - Deployed on **AWS**.

projects.title: AdametNext
projects.bodyText:
- A **web app** AdametNext is a brand insight & strategy support provider for **pharma** backed by a highly experienced team.
 - USA based project made **without database**.
 - All Forms are submited and directly mailed to the company email using **emailjs**.

projects.title: Online Burger Ordering Website Template
projects.bodyText:
- It is **Template** made for the sales Teams of NtageDL to get new projects by showing **cloud kitchen Templates**.
 - There is no need of **login**, user can directly add a burger in **cart** and order directly by adding address of his own.

projects.title: Gurpreet Singh Portfolio
projects.bodyText:
- Developer Portfolio Website made in React
 -  Fully customisable and dynamic, easily change data and images.
 - Dark Mode Support
